constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL SB1  South of the Borough

decision_conditions: It has not been demonstrated that the proposal would comply with Condition E.1 (b)  (total ground covered within curtilage) of Class E, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 (as amended).Permitted development rights for householders Technical Guidance September 2019  advises that E.1 (b)  the total area of ground covered by buildings, enclosures and containers within the curtilage  (other than the original dwellinghouse) would exceed 50% of the total area of the curtilage ( excluding the ground area of the original dwellinghouse).In this instance, no proposed block plan has been submitted identifying the position of the proposed outbuilding within the curtilage of the original dwelling house. Therefore, Officers have been unable to ascertain whether total area of ground covered by the proposal would exceed 50% of the total area of the curtilage of the original dwellinghouse.
description: Demolishment of existing garage and erection of new outbuilding to rear of property.
